title: CLI Command Schema
description: Schema for defining a single CLI command, including subcommand relationships. One command, One yaml file.

name.description: Logical identifier of this command/value node. Used for tooling and referencing irrespective of concrete CLI token names.

description.description: A short description of what the command does.

commandName.description: [type=command] Actual command name to specify on command line.

variableName.description: [type=string|integer|bool] Variable name that value stored in. UPPER_SNAKE_CASE.

valueFormat.description: [type=string|integer|bool] Format of value. For example, regex, wildcards or datetime format.

subcommandFileNames.description: Schema file names of subcommands. command|string|integer|boolean=select one, option=select multiple.

implementations.description: List of implementation specification of this command.

guardrails.description: List of guardrails of this command. Source of unit test generation.
